mapper.select: select post_id, account_id, title, post_date, contents, start_date, due_date, birth, address1, address2 from Post
mapper.insert: insert into Post(post_id, account_id, title, post_date, contents, start_date, due_date, birth, address1, address2) values(#{post_id}, #{account_id},#{title},#{post_date},#{contents}, #{start_date},#{due_date}, #{birth},#{address1},#{address2})
